mapper.select: SELECT c.user_seq, c.store_seq, c.pro_seq, p.name, p.category, s.store_name, s.location, s.store_number, m.price, m.count FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.pro_seq = p.pro_seq JOIN Store s ON c.store_seq = s.store_seq JOIN Menu m ON c.pro_seq = m.pro_seq AND c.store_seq = m.store_seq WHERE c.user_seq = #{userSeq};
